channel.title: Comments on: Whole Lotta Upgrading Going On

item.title: By: Dom
item.dc:creator: Dom
item.description:
Yeah, Bloglines supports basically everything. When I unsubscribe from your blog and resubscribe, it presents me with a choice of 5 feeds:
https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/rss2/] https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/atom/] https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/] https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/rss/] https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/comments/feed/]
All of them show 'Whole Lotta Upgrading' as the most recent entry. Even the Comments feed doesn't show those for the more recent blog posts.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, Bloglines supports basically everything. When I unsubscribe from your blog and resubscribe, it presents me with a choice of 5 feeds:

https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/rss2/]
https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/atom/]
https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/]
https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/feed/rss/]
https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/ [https://afkgamer.github.io/afkgamer-com/comments/feed/]

All of them show ‘Whole Lotta Upgrading’ as the most recent entry. Even the Comments feed doesn’t show those for the more recent blog posts.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
My guess is something with the upgrade to WordPress 2.0.1. My feed validates RSS, but WP is still stuck on Atom .3 (deprecated version), although I see on the Bloglines FAQ that it supports RSS also. *shrug*
Is that more than you wanted to know about feeds? More than I wanted to know, that's for sure. I'll check around and see if I can figure out what's the hap and thanks for the heads up.
EDIT: Looks like it's working now with Bloglines, was a problem with the permalink structure which is a commonish problem with WP 2+ upgrades. In case another WP user has a similar issue, I deleted my .htaccess, created a new empty one, had WP redo the file in Options/Permalinks, POOF, fixed.
And that's probably more than you wanted to know about WordPress.
item.content:encoded:
My guess is something with the upgrade to WordPress 2.0.1. My feed validates RSS, but WP is still stuck on Atom .3 (deprecated version), although I see on the Bloglines FAQ that it supports RSS also. *shrug*

Is that more than you wanted to know about feeds? More than I wanted to know, that’s for sure. I’ll check around and see if I can figure out what’s the hap and thanks for the heads up.

EDIT: Looks like it’s working now with Bloglines, was a problem with the permalink structure which is a commonish problem with WP 2+ upgrades. In case another WP user has a similar issue, I deleted my .htaccess, created a new empty one, had WP redo the file in Options/Permalinks, POOF, fixed.

And that’s probably more than you wanted to know about WordPress.

item.title: By: Dom
item.dc:creator: Dom
item.description: Hi, sorry, I just wanted to point out that since you upgraded, I don't seem to be picking up your posts on Bloglines. Every time I check, it only shows posts up until this one (Whole Lotta Upgrading). It's not picking up anything after that. Any idea what would cause that?
item.content:encoded: Hi, sorry, I just wanted to point out that since you upgraded, I don’t seem to be picking up your posts on Bloglines. Every time I check, it only shows posts up until this one (Whole Lotta Upgrading). It’s not picking up anything after that. Any idea what would cause that?

item.title: By: uruloki
item.dc:creator: uruloki
item.description:
<blockquote>Best incidental effect of World of Warcraft on the entire entertainment industry: improved primetime television viewership by queued WoW players.</blockquote>
Right on. I now have to (get to?) actually watch Grey's Anatomy with the Spousal Unit since I'm number 500-something in line.
item.content:encoded:
Best incidental effect of World of Warcraft on the entire entertainment industry: improved primetime television viewership by queued WoW players.

Right on. I now have to (get to?) actually watch Grey’s Anatomy with the Spousal Unit since I’m number 500-something in line.

item.title: By: Pharkas
item.dc:creator: Pharkas
item.description: I'd love to...if flakey ass Moonrunner could, like, stay up and when up not be craptastic.
item.content:encoded: I’d love to…if flakey ass Moonrunner could, like, stay up and when up not be craptastic.
